text: @SpeakerPelosi so you say.  is that all you got seriously ? without police officers getting beat up with 2 by 4s ? we have chaos in our country we know about COVID-19 we’re handling it !what is your problem Nancy?They are children being killed by guns by gangs ,, speak speaker?
